name: A. Chewbaсca and Number
statement:
Luke Skywalker gave Chewbacca an integer number . Chewbacca isn’t good
at numbers but he loves inverting digits in them. Inverting digit means
replacing it with digit . Help Chewbacca to transform the initial number
to the minimum possible number by inverting some (possibly, zero)
digits. The decimal representation of the final number shouldn’t start
with a zero.
